description.value:
With a spoken word, you invoke a minor, supernatural wonder. You create one of the following effects within range:

  • Your face or body glows with a faint light. You faintly glow in the dark and cast dim light 5ft from you while glowing in this way.
  • Your voice booms and becomes three times as loud for 1 minute.
  • Harmless tremors shake the ground within range for 1 minute.
  • You can cause one ration to feed up to 5 people for a day.
  • You can cause up to 1 liter of water to turn into 1 liter of cheap wine or vice versa.
  • You create an instantaneous sound from a point within range, such as a rumble of thunder, rustling trees, the caw of a raven, or ominous whispers. This cannot be used to mimic coherent voices or long-lasting, linear sounds, like music.
  • When used in a freshwater pond or river populated with fish, the first fish caught within the duration has 1gp in its mouth. This can only be done once per long rest.
